name: Project Rise and Fall
description:
---------------------------------------------------------------

You play as a test subject and trying to survive tests from a evil doctor...

---------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made for a school game jam named: Hyper Unicorn Gamejam Reborn with the Theme, Rise and Fall. Btw, this game was made in 3 days. I have no intentions of working further with this game, because I want to focus on other projects...

---------------------------------------------------------------

Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/RiseAndFall/735597
